name: Quests Unlimited (itch)
description:
Embark on a never ending quest for power and glory in Quests Unlimited!

Inspired by a love for classic idle games like Progress Quest, Quests Unlimited is a classical interpretation of the idle rpg genre with a more traditional rpg style of gameplay being emulated.  Accept and complete quests, sell your drops in town, equip new gear and spend your hard earned currency upgrading it and becoming more formidable.

Development:

This game is fully functional but is still going to need a little polishing. In other words, it's not quite done yet! Certain aspects, in particular the UI are going to need to be reworked a bit for aesthetics and ease of access. It's still being worked on and will NOT be abandoned before completion, so updates will be uploaded regularly. You might want to  utilize the itch app to for it's patching system as opposed to downloading the whole client every time. For more detailed information on development I suggest you come visit my DevLog to get a weekly update on progress. You can find it here:  https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=61020

Steam launch:

Those who have purchased the game here will be eligible for receiving a steam key to play the game on that platform.  I suggest claiming your free key so that you can play the latest versions of the game only available there.

Controls:

Escape key - pauses game and brings up an options menu.

In game buttons:

the green magnifying glass - locks the camera onto that party member. Press the red X to revert to smart camera model.

The green plus sign - opens up the equipment window so you can view that party member's equipment. . You can open the equipment upgrade UI by clicking on a piece of equipment in this window. Press the red X in the equipment window to close it.
